name: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past Redux
summary: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past Redux is a fork of Conn & qwertymodo’s A Link to the Past DX hack that further modifies the game to include changes to accommodate the game into the overall franchise, as well as renaming stuff badly translated and making changes for characters with official artwork not matching with the sprites/palettes in-game.
